ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Good overview on the methods and topics central to the social/affective study of nonverbal communication. I would not recommend if they wanted to discuss more cognitive aspects like I did.

I would recommend PSYC 570 to a student looking for a broad overview of nonverbal communication as a research method. The course terminates with a research proposal, which provides a good opportunity to apply the knowledge gained over the course of the semester and synthesize research interests and nonverbal methodology.
I would definitely recommend the course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This did not connect as much to my research as I had hoped but did get me to think some more about the implications of eye gaze in social behavior which is helpful.
